about_the_game:
Not all heroes wear capes, but heroes definitely need weapons to battle those pesky Dark CPUs! This weapon set gives Neptune, Noire, Blanc, and Vert 3 weapons to choose from, so equip wisely! The 4 Goddesses Online Hero Weapon Set includes:

Neptune
Knight Sword
Paladin Sword
Knight End Sword

Noire
Soul Rapier
Laevatein
Raven Stab

Blanc
Twilight Wand
Luminous Wand
Fantastic Rod

Vert
Cross Spear
Dark Cross Spear
Light Cross Spear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card

short_description: The 4 Goddesses Online Hero Weapon Set has your needs to equip your favorite Goddesses! Each of the 4 Goddesses has 3 weapons to choose from!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
